medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient is a ___ yo female with a history of 3 days of abdominal pain, starting in the epigastric area and becoming more pronounced in the lower abdomen yesterday. The pain has progressively worsened, especially in the last 3.5 hours. Morphine x 2 did not alleviate the pain, while Dilaudid provided relief. She has not experienced nausea or vomiting, but her temperature in the emergency department was recorded at 102.2Â°F.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Metastatic melanoma to the lymph nodes; multiple excisions of skin melanoma and right axillary dissection.
